sentences.en: a passionate defender of human rights
sentences.cn: 热诚的人权卫士

sentences.en: a passionate kiss
sentences.cn: 激情的一吻

sentences.en: a passionate lover
sentences.cn: 富有激情的爱人

sentences.en: a very passionate young man
sentences.cn: 一位感情热烈的年轻人

sentences.en: Anne is a passionate girl.
sentences.cn: 安妮是个多情的女孩.

sentences.en: Come, give a taste of your quality; come, a passionate speech.
sentences.cn: 来, 试一试你们的本领, 来一段激昂慷慨的剧词.

sentences.en: He brought to the job not just considerable experience but passionate enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 他不仅给这一工作带来了不少经验，而且倾注了极大的热情。

sentences.en: He had a brief but passionate love affair with an older woman.
sentences.cn: 他和一个比他年长的女子有过一段短暂而炽热的情史。

sentences.en: He is very passionate about the project.
sentences.cn: 他对那个项目非常热心。

sentences.en: He was passionate about all literature.
sentences.cn: 他热爱所有的文学作品.

sentences.en: Her voice is passionate. Her eyes are ablaze.
sentences.cn: 她声音激昂，目光如火。

sentences.en: I admire his passionate belief in what he is doing.
sentences.cn: 我佩服他对自己的工作所抱的坚定信心。

sentences.en: I'm a passionate believer in public art.
sentences.cn: 我是公共艺术的狂热信徒。

sentences.en: Joe is passionate about baseball.
sentences.cn: 乔十分爱好棒球.

sentences.en: Mahler was also known for his passionate involvements outside marriage.
sentences.cn: 马勒也因为其轰轰烈烈的婚外情而出名。

sentences.en: She developed a passionate interest in wild flowers.
sentences.cn: 她对野花产生了强烈的兴趣。

sentences.en: She was giving full vent to her passionate hatred.
sentences.cn: 她在充分地发泄她那燃烧的仇恨.

sentences.en: Sue is the extrovert in the family; opinionated, talkative and passionate about politics.
sentences.cn: 苏是家中的外向行动派，性格固执，能说会道，而且对政治非常热衷。

sentences.en: to have a passionate nature
sentences.cn: 天性易激动

sentences.en: We were both very tender and passionate towards one another.
sentences.cn: 我们相亲相爱，如胶似漆。

words.tran_cn: 不热情的，冷淡的；冷静的
热情的；热烈的，激昂的；易怒的

trans.tran_cn: 热烈的，激昂的，易怒的，易被情欲所支配的
trans.tran_en: showing or involving very strong feelings of sexual love
